snippet: When the New York Knicks acquired point guard Derrick Rose in the off-season they envisioned a playmaker who could accelerate to the rim and become a secondary scorer to Carmelo Anthony....
lead_paragraph: When the New York Knicks acquired point guard Derrick Rose in the off-season they envisioned a playmaker who could accelerate to the rim and become a secondary scorer to Carmelo Anthony.

headline.main: Rose Helps Anthony Bloom as Knicks Overcome Pacers
headline.print_headline: Rose Helps Anthony Bloom as Knicks Overcome Pacers
